tags: None
review: I have been consulting Dr.Manjula Raghuveer since 2014 during my conception issues, doctor helped me in referring to fertility specialist. Later with regular medical followups and property guidance from Dr.Sumana G an Dr.Manjula R, I became pregnant in 2015 and delivered my first baby in jan'16. My experience abt delivery was also good. Am conceived nw fr 2nd time, an consulting the same doctor fr prenatal checkups and will have my 2nd baby delivered by her. Pretty much happy with the service. Thanks a lot.....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was suffering from  dysmennorrhoea from the past ten years and I visited Dr Manjula Raghuveer at cloudnine. I was very happy with madam as she came as a saving grace and solved this nerve wracking issue I've been suffering from a long time. Thank you so much madam* *** *** *** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Am really impressed regarding the Doctor guidance and i saw my mother in her approach and having said the ambiance , doctor friendliness was the key elements to highlight and a very tenured and experienced Doctor, and Best Regards to Dr Manjula Raghuveer for her services rendered in Cloud9 which should be remembered and noted in books.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ******* ******* Highly recommend Dr Manjula for any Gynaec issues or pregnancy and delivery. Always so warm and enthusiastic, she made me look forward to my checkups. She performed my c section and the incision was perfection, which made my recovery very smooth and quick. She definitely will be my Gynaec for life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Maternal Care/ Checkup,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),
review:
As soon as she see the couple the husband will be her Son and the Wife is her Daughter in Law.  That’s the first time you get mistaken of considering her as Motherly lady. *** **** * ******** ** ******* **** ******* While we visited her for the first time on pregnancy success rate was bad the immediate process suggested was for IUI procedure. 

           ******* **** ******** ** ************* *** ******* *** ********* Due to our travel plan we had to postpone our next consultation and fortunately my wife was pregnant after returning from travel.  Due to the anxiety of past miscarriage my wife called the doctor with few queries and that’s when the doctors real character was showcased.

She literally yelled at my wife as it was evident that she could accept the pregnancy confirmation naturally happening which was against her plan. Although we proceeded for consultation in hospital and the medication prescribed was for constipation and computing ***** *** ***** * ******* *** ** ***** 

Considering the background of PCOS and a Miscarriage she was supposed to provide Progestrone Supporting medication which was never prescribed. And when we went for the heart beat scanning we understood that wee are into one more miscarriage.

When consulted the doctor and we were really surprised the way she conveyed on miscarriage was such way of expressing it and it was too easy for her and kind of like it was something she was expecting to happen. **** ********* **** ***** ******* ** *** *** * ******** ** *** *** ************ ******* *** *** *******. ******** **** ******* ******** ** *** *** ** **** ***** *********** *** ** **** *** **** *** ** ** **** ****

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: One of the MOST ***** ****** woman..I will not even call her a doctor.she is black spot on her profession...Such a selfish doctor..I don't know how cloud nine is still having her..ALL she cares is money..A big drama queen...AVOID HER AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE..

tags: None
context: family planning and full contraceptive services,
review: She is a great doctor and I would highly recommend her... she has been very professional and empathetic and have always given us right advice. Never seen a doc who has human connect... she is a great asset to Cloudnine... I want to wish her great success in life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: I always feel happy to see her ,she is energetic and calm person. I am seeing her again for my 2nd baby I hve decided in my mind dat my second baby also should be delivered with the help of dr Manjula.i wish more and more doctors should be like her.thank u doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: The most humble person I ever met. I wished I had met her earlier. . Never d late she took up my health issue n gave a positive response at 1st meeting n everytim I visit her , her positive energy empowers me n create a positive vibe. . God bless her. .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Manjula Raghuveer is friendly and listens with patience.. she explains everything clearly.. was referred to Dr Sumana she is also an amazing doctor.. Initially I taught cloud 9 is expensive and was skeptical .. I was referred by my friend .. what I did feel is cloud 9is not expensive and doctors are friendly and true to their proffessions. All the check ups were done on time.. only thing is wait time for consultation as there were too many patients.. after my daughter was born we have referred 7-8 of our friends to the same doctors and they also had a good experience with the treatment and delivery...

review: I have been consulting her for last four years and she delivered my second child at cloudnine. The one thing I truly appreciate is her empathy. She remembers all test reports, reassures in case of a problem and is ever smiling. She is patient in explaining test reports, medication and good practices.
